arts.ttl: Referee David Coote strongly refutes "false and defamatory allegations" regarding Leeds United game amid betting probe
arts.sum: Referee David Coote strongly refutes what he describes as "false and defamatory allegations" made against him for an incident involving a 2019 fixture between Leeds United and West Bromwich Albion.

arts.ttl: Leeds issue statement as David Coote incident at centre of fresh FA probe revealed
arts.sum: The Football Association have launched an investigation after it was claimed that referee David Coote - who's currently suspended by the PGMOL - allegedly discussed giving a yellow card with a fan before a match

arts.ttl: David Coote: FA investigating claims referee discussed giving yellow card
arts.sum: FA says ‘very serious’ allegations being looked at urgently Coote denies wrongdoing, says his integrity not in doubt The Football Association is investigating allegations that the referee David Coote discussed giving a yellow card before a game. The allegations centre on an exchange of messages before and after Coote refereed the Championship game between Leeds and West Brom in October 2019, in which he booked the Leeds defender Ezgjan Alioski. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Estevao Willian facing Brasileiro heartbreak as Palmeiras lose to Botafogo in top-of-the-table clash
arts.sum: Estevao Willian faces the possibility of missing out on a Brasileiro title with Palmeiras after they lose to Botafogo in Tuesday's top-of-the-table clash.

arts.ttl: David Coote breaks silence as shamed Premier League ref engulfed in third scandal
arts.sum: Suspended referee David Coote has released a statement to address fresh allegations that he discussed booking a Leeds player before taking charge of a Championship match

arts.ttl: David Gray lost for words as Hibs salvage point against Aberdeen after astonishing ending
arts.sum: The Easter Road boss felt his bottom-of-the-table side deserved to beat the high-flying Dons but in the end was delighted to salvage a point from an incredible match that featured THREE stoppage-time goals. "We've obviously shot ourselves in the foot a couple of times as well in moments within the game, but it's a point, and I think you can feel that sort of energy at the end at the stadium.

arts.ttl: David Coote reacts as FA investigate allegations referee discussed giving yellow card before match
arts.sum: The Sun claims the referee discussed with a friend booking a player before a game

arts.ttl: Suspended referee David Coote responds to deliberate yellow card allegations
arts.sum: Suspended referee David Coote responds after it was claimed he discussed handing a yellow card to a player before a match.

arts.ttl: David Coote faces new FA probe over betting claim
arts.sum: The English Football Association (FA) has launched an investigation into allegations suspended referee David Coote discussed handing out a yellow card before a match.

arts.ttl: David Coote breaks silence as FA Investigate Premier League referee over betting claims
arts.sum: Coote was suspended by the PGMOL after a video showed him making comments about Jurgen Klopp earlier this month
